reviews.text:
Very enjoyable stay. The staff was very welcoming and hospitable. They were very well-informed and cooperative in sharing information. Location is just minutes from the corner of the old town and right beside a bus stop.

The interior of the hotel and the rooms are meet and up-to-date. Bathrooms are in good condition. Mattresses and other furnishings are very comfortable.

They have central air conditioning and it is very effective when it gets too humid!

We enjoyed the breakfast. It had more than the typical items expected.

It is nice hotel with good service in good location- old town is within 20min walking distance. Breakfast was wonderful with good choice and in restaurant there are quite big children corner, where they can go to play and socialize. The only let down was parking - it is paid and as receptionist explained runned by Europark and so it is a bit pricy, I believe holes in the parking area will be fixed soon. My stay was nice and I love hotels like this.

It was a very good stay and a decent hotel. Girls at the front desk are friendly and professional. Room was okay (some parts like bathroom can take a bit of renovation in) and somewhat too compact. Breakfast was amazing, they have variety of great food to satisfy any taste and big selection of drinks. Clean amenities. Housekeeping staff left us vouchers for 2 free drinks at the restaurant. We walked to the Old Town from
The hotel, its like 1km away (15 mins walking), i find it very convenient. Front desk has a room in the back if you want to store your luggage after the check out. Ate pizza at the restaurant downstairs before we left, food and service were great. Thank you & i would stay there again.
Excellent hotel with friendly staff and very nice Spa. Deniss and Eva were extremely helpful in helping us get a Romantic Spa Night. I definitely recommend it for just 99€.

Rooms are spacious and well equipped, had jacuzzi in them and room sound isolation was great. Service and environment was really peaceful. Breakfast was good but food at the restaurant was really poor
